panels.title: System Overview - Info / CPU / Mem / Disk

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

targets.expr: system_memory_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_memory_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/pfrm2.0", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/pfrm2.0"} * 100

system_filesystem_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/storage", state="used"} / ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", mountpoint="/storage"} * 100

panels.description: Top interfaces with the highest RX traffic since last boot
panels.title: Top interfaces - Receive

panels.description: Top interfaces with the highest TX traffic since last boot
panels.title: Top interfaces - Transmit

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted

targets.expr: (system_filesystem_usage{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace", state="used"}/ ignoring (state) system_filesystem_limit{host_name="$d_hostname", environment=~"$d_environment", service_namespace=~"$d_namespace"}) * 100
